entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Percé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
